org.middleheaven.io.repository.watch
Interface Watchable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ManagedFile, MediaManagedFile, ModificationTracableManagedFile
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContainerManagedFile, AbstractManagedFile, AbstractMediaManagedFile, ArrayManagedFilePath, EmptyFileRepository.UnexistantManagedFile, PropertiesFile, TextFile, UploadRootFolder, VirtualFileManagedFilePath
public interface Watchable

Interface for a file container that supports watch-dog semantics.

Method Summary
 boolean isWatchable()
           
 WatchEventChannel register(WatchService watchService, WatchEvent.Kind... events)
          Create a watch channel for the repository.
 

Method Detail

isWatchable

boolean isWatchable()
Returns:
true if the registration of listeners and event trigger are supported.

register

WatchEventChannel register(WatchService watchService,
                           WatchEvent.Kind... events)
Create a watch channel for the repository.

Parameters:
events - an array of events that will be monitored for.
Returns:
a WatchEventChannel to handle triggered events.
